name: Sole Active Thick Footbeds - Unisex
description:
Cushy and supportive insoles designed for active use. EVA and Softec foam cushion the impact of each step, and the moisture-wicking top sheet helps feet stay dry and comfortable. Thick insoles are designed to be worn in footwear with wiggle room, such as hiking boots, loose-fitting runners and winter boots.Foam base is made with 20% recycled EVA.Heat-and-wear mouldable for a comfortable and personalized fit.3.2mm Softec open-cell foam adds shock absorption and comfort.Polygiene® antimicrobial treatment resists odour buildup.Latex-free and vegan.

        Sustainability
